property.name: initialLoadStatusSql
property.value: select status from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch where channel_id='reload' and node_id=?

property.name: selectEventsToBatchSql
property.value: select transaction_id, data_id from ${sync.table.prefix}_data_event where batched = 0 and node_id = ? and channel_id=? order by data_id asc

property.name: createBatchSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch (batch_id, node_id, channel_id, status, batch_type, create_time) values (null, ?, ?, ?, ?, current_timestamp)

property.name: updateBatchedEventsSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_data_event set batch_id = ?, batched = 1 where node_id = ? and data_id = ?

property.name: selectOutgoingBatchSql
property.value: select b.batch_id, b.node_id, b.channel_id, b.status, b.batch_type, b.create_time from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch b left join (select node_id, channel_id from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch where status = 'ER') e on e.node_id = b.node_id and e.channel_id = b.channel_id where b.node_id = ? and b.status in ('NE', 'SE', 'ER') order by case when e.channel_id is null then 1 else 2 end, b.batch_id

property.name: selectOutgoingBatchRangeSql
property.value: select batch_id, node_id, channel_id, status, batch_type, create_time from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch where batch_id between ? and ? order by batch_id

property.name: selectOutgoingBatchErrorsSql
property.value: select batch_id, node_id, channel_id, status, batch_type, create_time from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch where status = 'ER' order by batch_id

property.name: changeBatchStatusSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch set status=? where batch_id=?

property.name: selectEventDataToExtractSql
property.value: select d.data_id, d.table_name, d.event_type, d.row_data, d.pk_data, e.batch_id, d.create_time, d.trigger_hist_id from ${sync.table.prefix}_data d inner join ${sync.table.prefix}_data_event e on d.data_id = e.data_id where e.node_id = ? and e.batch_id = ? order by d.data_id asc

property.name: insertIntoDataSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_data (data_id, table_name, event_type, row_data, pk_data, trigger_hist_id, create_time) values(null, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, current_timestamp)

property.name: insertIntoDataEventSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_data_event (data_id, node_id, channel_id, transaction_id, batch_id, batched) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

property.name: findIncomingBatchSql
property.value: select batch_id, node_id, status, create_time from ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch where batch_id = ? and node_id = ?

property.name: findIncomingBatchErrorsSql
property.value: select batch_id, node_id, status, create_time from ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch where status = 'ER' order by batch_id

property.name: findIncomingBatchHistorySql
property.value: select batch_id, node_id, status, start_time, end_time, failed_row_number, byte_count, network_millis, filter_millis, database_millis, statement_count, fallback_insert_count, fallback_update_count, missing_delete_count, sql_state, sql_code, sql_message from ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch_hist where batch_id = ? and node_id = ? order by start_time

property.name: insertIncomingBatchSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch (batch_id, node_id, status, create_time) values (?, ?, ?, current_timestamp)

property.name: updateIncomingBatchSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch set status = ? where batch_id = ? and node_id = ? and status = ?

property.name: insertIncomingBatchHistorySql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch_hist (batch_id, node_id, status, network_millis, filter_millis, database_millis, host_name, byte_count, statement_count, fallback_insert_count, fallback_update_count, missing_delete_count, failed_row_number, start_time, end_time, sql_state, sql_code, sql_message) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

property.name: nodeChannelControlIgnoreSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_node_channel_ctl set ignore_enabled=? where node_id=? and channel_id=?

property.name: insertNodeChannelControlSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_node_channel_ctl (node_id,channel_id,ignore_enabled,suspend_enabled) values(?,?,?,?)

property.name: updateNodeSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_node set node_group_id=?, external_id=?, database_type=?, database_version=?, schema_version=?, symmetric_version=?, sync_url=?, heartbeat_time=?, sync_enabled=?, timezone_offset=? where node_id = ?

property.name: findNodeSql
property.value: select node_id, node_group_id, external_id, sync_enabled, sync_url, schema_version, database_type, database_version, symmetric_version from ${sync.table.prefix}_node where node_id = ?

property.name: findNodeByExternalIdSql
property.value: select node_id, node_group_id, external_id, sync_enabled, sync_url, schema_version, database_type, database_version, symmetric_version from ${sync.table.prefix}_node where node_group_id = ? and external_id = ?

property.name: findNodeSecuritySql
property.value: select node_id, node_password, registration_enabled, registration_time, initial_load_enabled, initial_load_time from ${sync.table.prefix}_node_security where node_id = ?

property.name: findNodeIdentitySql
property.value: select c.node_id, c.node_group_id, c.external_id, c.sync_enabled, c.sync_url, c.schema_version, c.database_type, c.database_version, c.symmetric_version from ${sync.table.prefix}_node c inner join ${sync.table.prefix}_node_identity i on c.node_id = i.node_id

property.name: isNodeRegisteredSql
property.value: select count(*) from ${sync.table.prefix}_node_security s inner join ${sync.table.prefix}_node n on n.node_id=s.node_id where n.node_group_id=? and n.external_id=? and s.registration_time is not null and s.registration_enabled=0

property.name: findNodesWhoTargetMeSql
property.value: select c.node_id, c.node_group_id, c.external_id, c.sync_enabled, c.sync_url, c.schema_version, c.database_type, c.database_version, c.symmetric_version from ${sync.table.prefix}_node c inner join ${sync.table.prefix}_node_group_link d on c.node_group_id = d.source_node_group_id where d.target_node_group_id = ? and d.data_event_action = ?

property.name: findNodesWhoITargetSql
property.value: select c.node_id, c.node_group_id, c.external_id, c.sync_enabled, c.sync_url, c.schema_version, c.database_type, c.database_version, c.symmetric_version from ${sync.table.prefix}_node c inner join ${sync.table.prefix}_node_group_link d on c.node_group_id = d.target_node_group_id where d.source_node_group_id = ? and d.data_event_action = ?

property.name: updateNodeSecuritySql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_node_security set node_password = ?, registration_enabled = ?, registration_time = ?, initial_load_enabled = ?, initial_load_time = ? where node_id = ?

property.name: findNodeToRegisterSql
property.value: select min(c.node_id) from ${sync.table.prefix}_node c inner join ${sync.table.prefix}_node_security s on c.node_id = s.node_id where s.registration_enabled = 1 and c.node_group_id = ? and c.external_id = ?

property.name: registerNodeSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_node set sync_enabled = 1, sync_url = ?, schema_version = ?, database_type = ?, database_version = ?, symmetric_version = ? where node_id = ?

property.name: registerNodeSecuritySql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_node_security set registration_enabled = 0, registration_time = current_timestamp where node_id = ?

property.name: reopenRegistrationSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_node_security set node_password = ?, registration_enabled = 1, registration_time = null where node_id = ?

property.name: openRegistrationNodeSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_node (node_id, node_group_id, external_id) values (?, ?, ?)

property.name: openRegistrationNodeSecuritySql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_node_security (node_id, node_password, registration_enabled) values (?, ?, 1)

property.name: updateOutgoingBatchSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch set status = ? where batch_id = ?

property.name: selectDataIdSql
property.value: select a.data_id from ${sync.table.prefix}_data a, ${sync.table.prefix}_data_event b where a.data_Id = b.data_Id and b.batch_id=? order by data_id asc

property.name: createdSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch_hist (batch_id, status, event_time, data_event_count) values (?, 'NE', current_timestamp, ?)

property.name: errorSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch_hist (batch_id, status, event_time, failed_data_id) values (?, 'ER', current_timestamp, ?)

property.name: okSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch_hist (batch_id, status, event_time) values (?, 'OK', current_timestamp)

property.name: sentSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch_hist (batch_id, status, event_time) values (?, 'SE', current_timestamp)

property.name: aquireLockSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_lock set locking_server_id=?, lock_time=current_timestamp where lock_id=? and lock_action=? and (lock_time is null or lock_time < ?)

property.name: releaseLockSql
property.value: update ${sync.table.prefix}_lock set lock_time=null where lock_id=? and lock_action=? and locking_server_id=?

property.name: insertLockSql
property.value: insert into ${sync.table.prefix}_lock (lock_id, lock_action) values(?,?)

property.name: selectOutgoingBatchIdsToPurgeSql
property.value: select batch_id, node_id from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch where status='OK' and create_time < ? order by batch_id asc

property.name: deleteFromOutgoingBatchHistSql
property.value: delete from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch_hist where history_id <= ?

property.name: deleteFromOutgoingBatchSql
property.value: delete from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch where batch_id=?

property.name: deleteFromEventDataIdSql
property.value: delete from ${sync.table.prefix}_data_event where batch_id=? and node_id=?

property.name: selectOutgoingBatchHistoryRangeSql
property.value: select min(history_id),max(history_id) from ${sync.table.prefix}_outgoing_batch_hist where event_time < ?

property.name: selectMinDataIdSql
property.value: select min(data_id) from ${sync.table.prefix}_data

property.name: selectMaxDataIdSql
property.value: select max(data_id) from ${sync.table.prefix}_data where create_time < ?

property.name: deleteFromDataSql
property.value: delete from ${sync.table.prefix}_data where data_id not in (select data_id from ${sync.table.prefix}_data_event where data_id >= ? and data_id <= ?) and data_id >= ? and data_id <= ?

property.name: selectIncomingBatchOrderByCreateTimeSql
property.value: select batch_id, node_id, status, create_time from ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch order by create_time asc

list.value: delete from ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch_hist where batch_id=? and node_id=?
delete from ${sync.table.prefix}_incoming_batch where batch_id=? and node_id=?
